summary: Diff implements WeatherVerse branding (document title + localized header title), adds imminent 1-hour weather alert detection (rain/snow/storm/fog) with an in-app dismissible banner and sessionStorage-based cooldown, and includes an optional Android WebView JS bridge with TypeScript typings and cooldown suppression. Also applies a new cohesive warm theme via CSS/Tailwind and broad UI styling updates.

hallucinated_features.description: Non-requested functional UI behavior change: location search results rendered via a portal-based FloatingAutocompleteDropdown for stacking/viewport-aware positioning.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-4 asks for cohesive visual theming and styling consistency; it does not explicitly request changing the interaction/DOM rendering strategy of the location search dropdown.
BuildRequest does not request adding/updating project tracking metadata files.
